skills.name: Slash Hook
skills.description: Attacks an enemy 2 times with fast punches. Each punch has a 50% chance to decrease the enemy's Attack Speed for 1 turn.

skills.name: Heavy Slash
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 2 times and stuns the enemy for 1 turn with a 30% chance for each attack. This attack will deal more damage according to your Defense.

skills.name: Wall of Ice
skills.description: Grants Immunity to all harmful effects for 3 turns and reflects 30% of damage back to the enemy. Removes all harmful effects.

skill_effect.name: Immunity
skill_effect.description: Monster is immune to all negative status effects

skill_effect.name: Reflect DMG
skill_effect.description: 33% of incoming damage is reflected back at the attacker. This does not nullify any Status Effects.
